meanings.definition: A small metal disc used for counting or as a token in a game.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny jeton on the floor and used it to keep track of my points in the game.
meanings.sent2: The players exchanged jetons to represent ownership of different properties on the board.
meanings.sent3: The jeton rolled under the couch, causing a commotion as everyone tried to retrieve it.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of jetons gleamed like a treasure trove, each one holding a special memory.
meanings.sent5: The jeton clinked against the others in the pile, creating a satisfying sound.

meanings.definition: A jet of water or gas.
meanings.sent1: The fountain sprayed a powerful jeton of water into the air, delighting the children.
meanings.sent2: The gas station attendant adjusted the nozzle to control the jeton of fuel flowing into the car.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chased after the jeton of water from the hose, trying to catch it in his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe sent a jeton of water shooting into the air, creating a temporary fountain in the street.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon rose gracefully, propelled by a steady jeton of gas from the burner.
